channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Pothole in road, 10th January
item.description:
Small but deep pot hole has appeared outside 7 Oldfield Crescent, Cheltenham.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 7 Oldfield Crescent, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road Flooding - Blocked Drain?, 10th January
item.description:
Harp Hill, just uphill of the junction with Greenway Lane is regularly flooding all the way across the carriage way, even after light rain. This makes it impassable for pedestrians and dangerous for cyclists There is a drain on either side of the carriage way. I wonder if these are simply blocked?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Harp Hill, Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: More Flytipped Rubbish at the Location, 10th January
item.description:
Since the last report of rubbish here - more has appeared. Please can it be cleared up - the location being the entrance to the Old Quarry off the Cleeve Common Road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): The Dingle, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The two bollards unlit, 9th January
item.description:
The two new bollards near the murco station opposite gotherington on the main road have no lights in them and are dangerous in the dark, cars are swerving when they see them. been like that since they were installed. Post code of location is GL52 8SA and the two bollards are either side of the petrol station
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 7 Vineries Close, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street Lights on roundabout, 9th January
item.description:
Hi, the street lights on the roundabout at end of corinium avenue that has llyods bank by it are not working.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A417, Barnwood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping between Luke Lane and Parkside Drive, Innsworth, Gloucester., 9th January
item.description:
Blocks of polystyrene and child's toy scooter dumped in stream. Too much other rubbish to take photos.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 26 Nicolson Close, Innsworth

item.title: Caravan, 7th January
item.description:
Caravan is often parked on Guan Road in the residential area on the road. It causes difficulty seeing further down the road and a crash has also occurred here recently too.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 67 Guan Road, Brockworth
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: DANGEROUS disintegrating patch reapir over manhole, 7th January
item.description:
A40 Lansdown Road, between junction with Shelburne Road and pedestrian crossing (to east of railway bridge). Inbound (eastbound) lane - manhole chamber has been covered in tarmac (chamber cover is loose / noisy), but tarmac patch has broken up within a couple of days resulting in large amount of debris in carriageway. Traffic is slowing / swerving to avoid if possible, but larger vehicles cannot miss it, thus breaking up tarmac further. DANGEROUS - NEEDS ATTENDING TO IMMEDIATELY. A proper repair is needed, not another dodge which disintegrates again within a couple of days.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 88 Lansdown Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A number of potholes on the roundabout, 7th January
item.description:
Various potholes and damage to the road surface, creating trip hazards for people crossing this busy junction and also to cyclists navigating the island.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 66 Hewlett Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Hedge and greenery needs cutting back behind bus stop on Tennyson Road opposite shops, 7th January
item.description:
As an able-bodied person I’ve never really thought about this but it’s a very narrow gap and should be widened from ability scooters wheelchairs and pushchairs

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 66a Tennyson Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
